subject: Inclusion of Provisions regarding acceptance of Insurance Surety Bonds (ISB) as Performance Security in Consultancy Contracts of Authority Engineer/Independent Engineer -reg.
text: MRdy 7514 TTHNf qferasrot (73w5 4Raev &k RTTHNf IRG RRGT) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) amtt TA +i-5 Qa 6, #z7-10, ERAT, 78 fcrft 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 TN/Phone 91-11-25074100 25074200 NHAI/ Policy Guidelines/ Miscellaneous/ 2025 Policy Circular No.18.105/2025 dated O9th July, 2025 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. FINDIV-22014(18)/10/2024-0/0 GM (Finance-Il) (Comp. No. 260098)} Sub: Inclusion of Provisions regarding acceptance of Insurance Surety Bonds (ISB) as Performance Security in Consultancy Contracts of Authority Engineer/ Independent Engineer In Supersession of Policy Circular No. 18.88/2023 dated 13.06.2023 and in Compliance to Ministry of Road Transport & Highways Letter No. NH-24028/14/2014-H(Vol-II) (E-134863) dated 31.05.2023 forwarded the amendments done by Department of Expenditure in GFR.2017 relating to inclusion of e-Bank Guarantee and Insurance Surety Bonds as mean to accept Bid  Security' and Performance Security MoRTH has already approved the changes in necessary clauses in the Standard Documents (RFP and CA of EPC HAM and BOT (Toll) modes which are already circulated by NHAI vide Policy Circular No. 18.88/ 2023 dated June, 2023_ 2 It is also pointed out that Highways Section of Ministry of Road Transport & Highways vide Letter NH-24028/ 14/2014-H(Vol-Il) (E-134863) dated 31.05.2023 has mentioned that For all the existing Contracts including Road Development, Toll Contracts, Ropeways and any Other Contract wherein Ministry has prescribed a BG- any instrument of Bid  Security/ Performance Security may be replaced by 'Insurance Surety Bond' as per availability. 3_ In light of above, it has now been decided to accept the Insurance Surety Bonds as "Performance Security" pertaining to Consultancy Contracts of Authority Engineer / Independent Engineer with immediate effect: The relevant existing clauses vis-a-vis amended clauses of the Standard Documents will also change accordingly for necessary compliance by all Concerned. 4 Copy of formats of 'Insurance Surety Bond" as Performance Security for Consultancy Contracts of Authority Engineer and Independent Engineer is attached at Annexure-A & Annexure-B respectively for implementation. 5. This issue with the approval of Competent Authority: Encl:: As stated above. (CS. Sanjay Kumar Patel) Ilc Chief General Manager (Coord.) To: All Officers of NHAI HQ/ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices to: 1. Hindi Division for translation in Hindi. 2 Library for hosting the circular on library site. 3. Web Admin for circulation.
